typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductAlternateKey as string,
		ProductSubcategoryKey as integer,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode as string,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode as string,
		EnglishProductName as string,
		SpanishProductName as integer,
		{[FrenchProductName} as integer,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		FinishedGoodsFlag as boolean,
		Color as string,
		SafetyStockLevel as short,
		ReorderPoint as short,
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		{[SizeRange} as integer,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		DaysToManufacture as integer,
		ProductLine as string,
		{[DealerPrice} as integer,
		Class as string,
		Style as string,
		{[ModelName} as integer,
		{[LargePhoto} as integer,
		{[EnglishDescription} as integer,
		{[FrenchDescription} as integer,
		{[ChineseDescription} as integer,
		{[ArabicDescription} as integer,
		{[HebrewDescription} as integer,
		{[ThaiDescription} as integer,
		{[GermanDescription} as integer,
		{[JapaneseDescription} as integer,
		{[TurkishDescription} as integer,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp,
		{[Status} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: '\nSELECT \n      P.[ProductNumber] as [ProductAlternateKey]\n      ,PS.[ProductSubcategoryID] as [ProductSubcategoryKey]\n      ,[WeightUnitMeasureCode] as [WeightUnitMeasureCode]\n      ,[SizeUnitMeasureCode] as [SizeUnitMeasureCode]\n      ,P.[Name] as [EnglishProductName]\n      ,NULL as [SpanishProductName]\n      ,NULL as [[FrenchProductName]\n      ,[StandardCost]\n      , [FinishedGoodsFlag] \n	        ,[Color] as [Color]\n      ,[SafetyStockLevel]as [SafetyStockLevel]\n      ,[ReorderPoint] as [ReorderPoint]\n      ,[ListPrice] as [ListPrice]\n      ,[Size]\n      ,NULL as [[SizeRange]\n      ,[Weight]\n      ,[DaysToManufacture]\n      ,[ProductLine]\n      ,NULL as [[DealerPrice]\n      ,[Class]\n      ,[Style]\n      ,NULL as [[ModelName]\n      ,NULL as [[LargePhoto]\n      ,NULL as [[EnglishDescription]\n      ,NULL as [[FrenchDescription]\n      ,NULL as [[ChineseDescription]\n      ,NULL as [[ArabicDescription]\n      ,NULL as [[HebrewDescription]\n      ,NULL as [[ThaiDescription]\n      ,NULL as [[GermanDescription]\n      ,NULL as [[JapaneseDescription]\n      ,NULL as [[TurkishDescription]\n      ,[SellStartDate] as [StartDate]\n      ,[SellEndDate] as [EndDate]\n      ,NULL as [[Status]\n  FROM [dbo].[Product] P\n  LEFT join [dbo].[ProductSubcategory] PS ON P.[ProductSubcategoryID]=PS.[ProductSubcategoryID]',
	format: 'query') ~> SourceData
source(output(
		ProductKey as integer,
		ProductAlternateKey as string,
		ProductSubcategoryKey as integer,
		Color as string,
		Size as string,
		Weight as double,
		Status as string,
		isCurrent as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [ProductKey]\n      ,[ProductAlternateKey]\n      ,[ProductSubcategoryKey]\n      ,[Color]\n      ,[Size]\n      ,[Weight]\n      ,[Status]\n	  ,isCurrent\n  FROM [AW_Data_Warehouse].[dbo].[DimProduct]',
	format: 'query') ~> ExistingRecords
ExistingRecords select(mapColumn(
		Existing_ProductKey = ProductKey,
		Existing_ProductAlternateKey = ProductAlternateKey,
		Existing_ProductSubcategoryKey = ProductSubcategoryKey,
		Existing_Color = Color,
		Existing_Size = Size,
		Existing_Weight = Weight,
		Existing_Status = Status,
		Existing_isCurrent = isCurrent
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ExistingRecordsz
SourceData derive(SourceType1RecordHash = shah(256,ProductAlternateKey,Weight,Color)) ~> SourceFileHash
SourceFileHash, ExistingRecordsz_Hash exists(SourceType1RecordHash == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
ExistingRecordsz derive(ExistingRecordsHash = shah(256,Existing_ProductAlternateKey,Existing_Weight,Existing_Color)) ~> ExistingRecordsz_Hash
Exists1, ExistingRecordsz_Hash lookup(ProductAlternateKey == Existing_ProductAlternateKey,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(Existing_ProductKey),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit@(NewItems, UpdatedItems)
ConditionalSplit@NewItems derive(isCurrent = '1') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ProductKey as integer,
		ProductAlternateKey as string,
		ProductSubcategoryKey as integer,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode as string,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode as string,
		EnglishProductName as string,
		SpanishProductName as string,
		FrenchProductName as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		FinishedGoodsFlag as boolean,
		Color as string,
		SafetyStockLevel as integer,
		ReorderPoint as integer,
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		SizeRange as string,
		Weight as double,
		DaysToManufacture as integer,
		ProductLine as string,
		DealerPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Class as string,
		Style as string,
		ModelName as string,
		LargePhoto as binary,
		EnglishDescription as string,
		FrenchDescription as string,
		ChineseDescription as string,
		ArabicDescription as string,
		HebrewDescription as string,
		ThaiDescription as string,
		GermanDescription as string,
		JapaneseDescription as string,
		TurkishDescription as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp,
		Status as string,
		iscurrent as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ProductAlternateKey,
		ProductSubcategoryKey,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode,
		EnglishProductName,
		SpanishProductName,
		FrenchProductName = {[FrenchProductName},
		StandardCost,
		FinishedGoodsFlag,
		Color,
		SafetyStockLevel,
		ReorderPoint,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		SizeRange = {[SizeRange},
		Weight,
		DaysToManufacture,
		ProductLine,
		DealerPrice = {[DealerPrice},
		Class,
		Style,
		ModelName = {[ModelName},
		LargePhoto = {[LargePhoto},
		EnglishDescription = {[EnglishDescription},
		FrenchDescription = {[FrenchDescription},
		ChineseDescription = {[ChineseDescription},
		ArabicDescription = {[ArabicDescription},
		HebrewDescription = {[HebrewDescription},
		ThaiDescription = {[ThaiDescription},
		GermanDescription = {[GermanDescription},
		JapaneseDescription = {[JapaneseDescription},
		TurkishDescription = {[TurkishDescription},
		StartDate,
		EndDate,
		Status = {[Status},
		iscurrent = isCurrent
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> InsertTarget
